docs.lead_paragraph: More than two-thirds of French voters want conservative candidate Francois Fillon to withdraw his presidential bid following an alleged fake job's scandal, according to an Ifop poll for the weekly Journal du Dimanche newspaper.

headline.print_headline: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race
headline.main: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race

docs.snippet: More than two-thirds of French voters want conservative candidate Francois Fillon to withdraw his presidential bid following an alleged fake job's scandal, according to an Ifop poll for the weekly Journal du Dimanche newspaper....

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's Hydro One Ltd is in talks to buy municipal electricity distributor Toronto Hydro Corp for about C$3 billion (1.82 billion pounds) as the city of Toronto explores options to finance various infrastructure projects, people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

headline.print_headline: Canada's Hydro One in Talks to Buy Toronto Hydro-Sources
headline.main: Canada's Hydro One in Talks to Buy Toronto Hydro-Sources

docs.lead_paragraph: A University of Hawaii professor is working to get an entire curriculum at the university taught in Hawaiian to supplement the language courses taught to children across the state.
